hanzi-su-wiki:
応

Значения

Отвечать, соглашаться, выполнять (просьбу), соответствовать; отвечать; отклик

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Будучи во дворце (под навесом 广), всем сердцем 心 реагировать на вопросы государя.

Варианты

應, 应
purpleculture_pinyin:
yìng
Japanese variant of 应
Японский вариант слова should
rtega_mnemonic:
應應RS
应应		応should, ought to, need, respond to, answer
  • mind 心 ready to respond like a falcon 䧹
  • ⓢ mind 心 wide 广 open with a attention: ready to respond 応 → 应
heisig_story: Cave . . . heart. The sense of the key word here is of something appropriate that fills a particular need, and hence "applies."
myStory:
respond to someone, agree with someone - someone reached the heart in your monastery

應 - the spirit of the bird that kills
a wild goose (䧹) in your heart (心) would satisfy you
the man with the little bird (倠) under the stony cliff (广) is on a wild goose chase
the man (亻) with the little bird (隹)
(looks like) a little bird in a cage

应
Keyword_KANJIDIC: apply, answer, yes, OK, reply, accept
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: применять, ответ, да, хорошо, ответ, принять
koohiiStory1: In the videogame Zelda, Link enters a CAVE to visit a fairy that will APPLY magic to fill his HEART containers.
koohiiStory2: [bravo, scottamus!] To apply for the job as a (replacement) Batman, you have to make it to the heart of the cave past all the traps he set up to test you. There, you see a table with the application form on it. Now that you think about it, the ad in the paper did say "Those who don´t make it to the heart of the cave need not apply.".
kunYomi: あた.る、まさに、こた.える
jp_example_words:
応急(おうきゅう): emergency
応募(おうぼ): subscription, application
相応(そうおう): suitability, fitness
対応(たいおう): interaction, correspondence, coping with, dealing with
適応(てきおう): adaptation, accommodation, conformity
反応(はんのう): reaction, response
相応しい(ふさわしい): appropriate
一応(いちおう): once, tentatively, in outline, for the time being
応援(おうえん): aid, assistance, help, reinforcement, support, cheering
応じる(おうじる): respond, satisfy, accept, comply with, apply for
応ずる(おうずる): answer, respond, meet, satisfy, accept
応接(おうせつ): reception
応対(おうたい): receiving, dealing with
応用(おうよう): application, put to practical use
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If someone gets under the canopy over your heart you should respond to them.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You usually ignore everyone, but this one person... they really got under there and touched your heart. You finally feel like they're the right person to respond to.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You respond and it turns out it was to the 王 (おう).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: The 王 touched your heart, you responded, and now you're together. It's like a fairy tale!
Ru_Meaning: apply, answer, yes, OK, reply, accept
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the heart (心) under the stony cliff (广) satisfies

Radicals: 广, 心  (canopy, heart)
Meaning Mnemonic
If someone gets under the canopy over your heart you should respond to them.
You usually ignore everyone, but this one person... they really got under there and touched your heart. You finally feel like they're the right person to respond to.
Reading Mnemonic
You respond and it turns out it was to the 王 (おう).
The 王 touched your heart, you responded, and now you're together. It's like a fairy tale!
